Supie collapse: Nicola Willis wants third competitor to ‘break up’ supermarket duopoly https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supie-collapse-nicola-willis-wants-third-competitor-to-break-up-supermarket-duopoly/VOHCHCAMS5AXDBRPDSWBCRZN44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supie-collapse-nicola-willis-wants-third-competitor-to-break-up-supermarket-duopoly/VOHCHCAMS5AXDBRPDSWBCRZN44/ Her promise comes in the wake of the collapse of online grocer Supie. Small Hall Sessions: Nadia Reid’s songs ‘unique and profound’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/small-hall-sessions-nadia-reids-songs-unique-and-profound/7R5FT3MXCRHRLALADXLC7Q6EIY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/small-hall-sessions-nadia-reids-songs-unique-and-profound/7R5FT3MXCRHRLALADXLC7Q6EIY/ Reid will be accompanied by Sam Taylor on guitar and Richie Packard on bass.
